title: (x) Script on Aimee Mann "Bachelor No. 2" album cover - Artscript No.1 {Arun}
content:
Anyone here know what script font is used on the cover of aimee manns cd Bachelor No.2?

Here at link to the cover:  
 [http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00004RG4Y.01.\_SCLZZZZZZZ\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007165145/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/B00004RG4Y.01._SCLZZZZZZZ_.jpg "http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00004RG4Y.01.\_SCLZZZZZZZ\_.jpg")

Thanx a lot!

 [‹ (x) "Elle Lui", similar to FF Qtype Extended - various alternatives {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007165145/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40022 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Upright script w/ curly swashes - Fling {Marcelo} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007165145/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40038 "Go to next forum topic")
author: madebytim

comments.content: Btw, nice work on your site, Tim!
